title: Khun Churn
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Chinese, Organic, Thai, Buffet, Salad bar
description: Offers a daily vegetarian lunch buffet with a large variety of fresh vegetable dishes. Other times a la carte menu available. Directions: Tell taxi it's by Ngamwongwan soi 6, near Ngamwongwan expressway entrance, not very long after turning into Ngamwongwan soi 6, you will see the restaurant on the left.
